title: 110_hr2943
content: Benefit Rating Acceleration for Veteran Entitlements Act of 2007 - Amends titles II (OASDI) and XVI (SSI) of the Social Security Act to treat as a disability for OASDI and SSI disability payment purposes any service-connected total disability, as rated and certified by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs. Applies the same treatment to related child's insurance and widow's and widower's insurance benefits.
